comment: Well, the US (we) also had to fight Japan and you Nazis had Italy's help... Look Nazi, if you don't want to be a debt slave you will need to create a separate country or defeat the debt-based slavery system but you Nazis are impotent losers and therefore too weak to do any of that. :roll
